title: 买了PC正版 还要买win10吗
author: 迷の十六
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 米斯琪
replies.txt_content:
购买过PC正版，可在官网上免费兑换 Minecraft:Windows 10 Edition 
登录minecraft.net，点击GET GAME就能看到相关选项

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content:
登录mojang官网，下面有个
Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition

Since you already own the PC/Mac version of Minecraft you have received Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition for free. If you haven't already claimed your gift code, click the "Redeem" button below then follow the instructions.
下面就是礼品码，你需要有微软账号

replies.author: Chrisの葉子
